column5: Hey Guys, Don't miss JP's brand new show Getting School'd tonight on WFN at 830pm!
Thanks for the reminder ! Gunna order pizza for supper and watch the new show !
oh yeah thanks for the reminder i will be sure to watch it!  Cheers!
I'll be sure to check it out. I liked the Garpike episode last night!
Another CANADIAN fishingstar will be born tonight.  JP, Congrats.
Yes it is awesome to see!!!!  Im sure he will be great!
Ill be watching.  Also, the fly fishing for gar pike was a great episode.
ive been counting down the days! cant wait to see the show tonite!
ahhhhhhhhhh   I missed it.    hope wfn plays re-runs....   maybe play J.P instead of charlie moore re-runs....hehe
I love the WFN my wife got it for me 2 weeks ago and since, the bathroom I was redoing hasn't made any more progress.
what a great show! very informative. cant wait to see the next one!
I enjoyed the show.. Nice information on some new products.. might have to look into a few as well.. (as if I haven't spent enough money on fishing stuff already - thanks a lot JP!)
WTG, JPD.
Great show. Being a new angler.... I think its going to help me understand the gear alot more... Good show JPD !  We need to make him an OFC'er !
very enjoyable. Good job.
JPD has been a good member here for a long time.  Congrats on the new show!
Really  ?? haha I guess I'm the new guy so I didn't know !
Saw some of it, but had company so missed most of it....what I saw looked interesting...  Maureen

Thanks for all the kind words guys. It really does feel good knowing that the information on the show is found useful by the viewers and that they can apply it to the soft water season coming. That will be our goal throughout the show, making information the focus.  Thanks Dave for the show push and as always really loved your gar show with Nick... too funny.  For those that missed it the show will repeat on Sunday night at 9:30 pm and if you guys haven't registered for the Great Gear Giveaway contest, do so... there is a bunch of great stuff from the show that is new to the market for 2009 and some tried and true classics. Here is the link: http://www.wfn.tv/gearweek/contest.php and try to help each other out with the voting... this is a big community that should be able to do well in these contests.  JP
I agree!!! "we're gonna catch the SAME BASS NINE TIMES".... I counted, it's more like 47.  Nice show JP, I was wondering where you were hiding!
Good job JP!

the show was not what I was expecting... ....what I got was pretty much the best graphical new show on TV fishing wise, I learned something and he came out of it looking like a veteran TV dude........to say I was impressed is understating it
I really enjoyed the show and found it informative. Especially the part where he back lashed...lol...nice to see the pros do it too once in a while.

I only have basic cable + the Discovery channel package so I don't watch WFN.  I met JPD last week at my local tackle shop and from what I can tell, he's a very down-to-earth type guy who gave me some great advice on fishing the Niagara.  All the best

I thought JP did real well, handled himself great  I don't know how much I am interested in a  show about new equipment, but I watched it and and it was well done  I will watch it again to see if I can gain an interest in it, but would rather see you hauling in big bass, then speaking to  Jimmy Huston
